content.body: I would be happy to do every second week, maybe alternating between the Monday time slot and the Wednesday one. On Wednesday I will be available some times but not others, I unfortunately have a meeting at a weird interval that makes it so I'm free one week every two but it's not always the same one
On Thursday one hour later I have a meeting every 4 weeks, and the next occurrence of that meeting is on June 26th
* On Thursday one hour later I have a meeting every 2 weeks, and the next occurrence of that meeting is on June 26th

m.new_content.body: On Thursday one hour later I have a meeting every 2 weeks, and the next occurrence of that meeting is on June 26th
